SELECT u.*, r.*, m.* FROM t_user u INNER JOIN t_user_role ur ON ur.user_id= u.uid INNER JOIN t_role r ON r.rid = ur.role_id INNER JOIN t_role_menu mr ON mr.role_id = r.rid INNER JOIN t_menu m ON mr.menu_id = m.mid WHERE u.uid=#{uid} GROUP BY m.mname order by mid;
